Comments_List: Practical and theoretical approach to image processing
By taking this course I developed an understanding of the theory and application behind image processing techniques, such as registration and segmentation.
Basic ideas about image processing, and also some maths and programming.
Good lecturers, but sometimes too theoretical, need more on practical implementation
This course was well structured, and the problem sets were fair and allowed for an accurate review of the material covered in lecture.
Yes. Great lectures, good hw problems
I would recommend this class to student who use medical imaging in their research, or have an interest in medical image processing.
